programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: The Romantic Songs playlist is a collection of the sweetest and most heart-fluttering K-pop tracks. Filled with dreamy melodies, heartfelt lyrics, and charming performances, this playlist captures the essence of love in all its forms. From playful confessions to deep emotions, every song adds a romantic touch. Whether you're falling in love or reminiscing about precious memories, this playlist is the perfect soundtrack for the moment!
